content.description: A hard technical start leads to a steep finger - small hand crack. A lot of climbing in just 60 feet!!    Use your rests wisely.
content.protection: Green alien -#1 cammalot, nuts, 2 bolts.   Doubles in .5 cammalot helpful   2 bolt chain anchors
content.location: Can't miss this beautiful splitter on the east face of the Christmas Ornament   Rappel (2-bolt chain anchors)

content.description: A somewhat powerful boulder start leads to the crux at a small overhang. High step to gain the huge cristals- finish the move and find a perfect clipping stance.
content.location: Located on the south east side of The Ornament.   Climb the bolted face/arÃªte just left of The Gift   Rappel (2-bolt chain anchors)

content.description: Just breaking into leading trad this is a route that you should give a go. Follow the flake and crack past the only bolt and the crux. The gear is there but it is marginal at best. Wanting the route to see traffic the bolt went in. Finish with a little bit of off-width.
content.location: Window Shopping is on the south side of The Ornament about 20 feet up the gully to the left of Black Friday

content.description: Strapped for time but want to get a couple of climbs in after work or to just cap off your climbing day this is the place.    3 distinctly different routes from 5.7 to solid 5.11.   And only a 2 minute approach.
